formalText: They didn't take their Adderall because they didn't want to do anything yesterday.
They are dealing with their living arrangement slightly changing.
They pick up Ian up to watch him for a few hours.
Yesterday was interesting for them, they felt crappy all day, but they weren't bummed out about the game going poorly.
They have fantasy that they are completely helpless when are not.
They fear they are going to let their kid down.
They lack in self confidence when it comes to a lot of things.
They feel kind of crummy about themself as a result in of their lack of confidence.
